original_text: But when you want everyone to meet together, make a different sound with the trumpet.
korean_text: 또 회중을 모을 때에도 나팔을 불 것이나 소리를 크게 내지 말며

sentences.original_text: But when you want everyone to meet together
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 당신이 모든 사람이 함께 만나기를 원할 때

sentences.original_text: make a different sound with the trumpet
